page.title: 08DANIEL'S LEISURE TIME
page.content: Here is a typical week of after-school activities - Monday: ride bike, watch television. Tuesday: go swimming, watch television. Wednesday: ride bike around streets where I live. Change into uniform for cubs which start at 6.30 p.m. in the school hall.Watch television until bedtime. Thursday: Call for Philip to play football in the street, but go home at 7.30 p.m. to watch one of my favourite television programmes 'Tomorrow's World'. Friday: Call for Philip, Daniel and Eon and build camps together in a nearby field. Watch television until bedtime.
